net.jibini.glutils

Class Shader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jibini.glutils.Shader

  • public class Shader
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for handling shader programs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shader(java.lang.String vertex, java.lang.String fragment)
      Creates and compiles shaders and attaches them to the program.

    • Method Summary

      Destroys the shader program.

      Retrieves a shader attribute location.

      Gives access to the shader program.

      Retrieves a shader uniform location.

      • Shader

        public Shader(java.lang.String vertex,

        Creates and compiles shaders and attaches them to the program.

        Sets standard uniforms (matrices and sampler).
        Parameters:
        matrices - Current set of matrices.
        sampler - Currently bound texture number.

      • createStdShader

        public static Shader createStdShader()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a simple default shader program.
        Returns:
        Simple default shader program.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file loading error occurs.
